answers.answer: Hi! How were your Hcgs in the beginning. My levels are not rising fast enough. I am only 6.3 weeks with cramping and spotting everyday. I too am on prgesterone and i am so worried.

Hi girls,I miss you too! I am on bed rest not allowed to be at the computer more than 5min. a day darn! 8 weeks now no spotting still on progesterone of course!! 4-5 more weeks of that..tomorrow u/s the peanut is 0.45'' heartbeat so cute will see wed. the progesss.like you can't wait to be july 14 end of 1st trim. !!For the other lady with slow HCG raising does double every 72 h. or 64% every 48h.? at least  how much was your first HCG number? how many weeks are you?Good luck to you allGeneva

Hey you guys, glad to hear everything is working out good. Im only going on 8 wks. Cant wait for 1st trimester to be over. I have never been so tired in my life....I spent last night till 3 am in the hospital. My husband crashed his bicycle and landed on his head. He was wearing a helmet so he is ok. We were at the hospital for 7 hours. I was so miserable, towards the end he let me sleep on his hospital bed while he sat in a chair..lol Anyhow Im so glad everything is good....talk to you guys later....ps..I had u/s also a week ago. saw heartbeat and the little peanut. go for another u/s and diabetes test next tues. Keep your fingers crossed for me....

question: Hey there...long time, no chat.I have been in and out of town for the last 4 wks and have not had much "fun" time on the internet. I'm bacck in S.A. for the 2nd time this month and we will be here til the 24th. Then I come back again on the 30th. I am doing good.  So, 10.5 wks and counting.  Still on progesterone for the next week & 1/2.  Had my last u/s last Tues. and everything was good!  Can't wait to be done with the 1st trimester.  I haven't heard from Geneva and see she hasted posted.  Hope everything is ok.  How are you?Bev
title: Msklar - Hey!
